trait.name: Guiding Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the initiate gains advantage on the next ranged attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The initiate can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.
